name: My Talking Hal
description:
Hal is a special mouse who needs care, affection and love. 

Talking mouse Hal will make you the happiest owner of a virtual pet.

Features of My Talking Hal

Feed Talking Hal regularly with his favorite food.

Take care of Hal's hygiene, bathe him when he gets dirty.

Decorate Talking Hal's home.

Pet your little talking virtual mouse and spoil him.

Play mini-games with Talking mouse Hal and win coins that you can use for shopping.

Talk to your mini virtual pet, and he will repeat every word you say.

Ride a helicopter, play football and basketball with Talking mouse Hal.

Watch how your virtual mouse's feelings and emotions change, just like the real pet.

Go ahead and download My Talking Hal from the app store for free. Join other players who already adopted this lovely talking virtual pet. Be one of them and make Talking mouse Hal your virtual pet.

Download link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gravity.mytalkinghal

Our site: https://www.gravity-code.com/
